lyrics.text: Lesson 39. Am I all right? First listen and then answer the question. Why did Mr. Gilbert
lyrics.translation: 第39课。我没事吧？首先听录音，然后回答问题。吉尔伯特先生为什么

lyrics.text: telephone Dr. Millington? While John Gilbert was in hospital, he asked his doctor to tell him
lyrics.translation: 给米灵顿医生打电话吗？当约翰·吉尔伯特住院时，他请求他的医生告诉他

lyrics.text: whether his operation had been successful, but the doctor refused to do so. The following day,
lyrics.translation: 他想知道自己的手术是否成功，但医生拒绝回答。第二天，

lyrics.text: the patient asked for a bedside telephone. When he was alone, he telephoned the hospital
lyrics.translation: 病人要求提供床头电话。当他独自一人时，他给医院打了电话。

lyrics.text: exchange and asked for Dr. Millington. When the doctor answered the phone, Mr. Gilbert said he
lyrics.translation: 交换并询问了米灵顿医生。当医生接电话时，吉尔伯特先生说他

lyrics.text: was inquiring about a certain patient, a Mr. John Gilbert. He asked if Mr. Gilbert's operation had
lyrics.translation: 询问了一位特定的病人，一位名叫约翰·吉尔伯特的先生。他问吉尔伯特先生的手术是否

lyrics.text: been successful, and the doctor told him that it had been. He then asked when Mr. Gilbert would
lyrics.translation: 成功了，医生告诉他确实如此。然后他问吉尔伯特先生何时会

lyrics.text: be allowed to go home, and the doctor told him he would have to stay in hospital for another two
lyrics.translation: 被允许回家，医生告诉他他必须再在医院待两个

lyrics.text: weeks. Then Dr. Millington asked the caller if he was a relative of the patient. No, the patient
lyrics.translation: 几周后。然后米灵顿博士问打电话的人他是否是病人的亲戚。不，病人

lyrics.text: answered, I am Mr. John Gilbert.
lyrics.translation: 回答，我是约翰·吉尔伯特先生。
